questiontext.text: 88% of boys in high schools had a side job during the summer. For girls at the same schools, the percentage is 82%. A researcher takes two random samples: one among boys and the other among girls. Each sample contains 500 students. What then is approximate distribution of the proportion of girls with jobs?

answer.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.18 and standard error of 0.017.

feedback.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.18 and standard error of 0.017…: Incorrect

answer.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.82 and standard error of 1.

feedback.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.82 and standard error of 1.:Incorrect

answer.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.82 and standard error of 0.017.

feedback.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.82 and standard error of 0.017…: Correct

answer.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.88 and standard error of 0.017.

feedback.text: It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.88 and standard error of 0.017…: Incorrect
